name: Synthyfriends Dungeon
description:
Synthyfriends Dungeon

How to Play:

Movement: 

- WASD (or the keys where those are on a en-us keyboard but on your locale)

- Move the mouse to make the movement buttons appear and then click them

Interact with Synthyfriends: 

- 1,2,3,4 keys

- click the item buttons at the top of screen

Pickup treasure diskettes or use portals:

- G key

- click the grab button at the top of screen

Quit Game: 

- Escape key

Font Attribution:

Sorry Mac Users, I've hidden the download for now as it is not working. After the Jam judging period is over i will be able to upload a new version.

Changes:

- Version 1.1

  Fixes some layout issues on ultra wide 21:9 aspect ratio, including unable to click the play button.

  

- Version 1.0

  Initial release.
